https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kfodNnpHW9KG4Ki0K5EsFP0fkvR.jpg Against his wishes, 'Cuba' Mukundan goes to Dubai to make good his father's alleged misappropriation of funds from the local cooperative bank. It is there that he learns the true meaning of the term 'working class' and realizes the irrelevance of the Communist movement back home. Arabikkatha
